game.name: SNAKE GAME ULTRA CORE
game.shortDescription: SNAKE GAME ULTRA CORE is an arena shooter where you play as a snake with a shotgun, escaping from a laboratory and seeking revenge on your enemies.
game.shortDescriptionEn: SNAKE GAME ULTRA CORE is an arena shooter where you play as a snake with a shotgun, escaping from a laboratory and seeking revenge on your enemies.

reviewHighlights.text: SNAKE GAME ULTRA CORE was a disappointment. The controls are awkward, the graphics are outdated, and constantly dodging projectiles quickly becomes bo...
